com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi

Interface RemoteTransaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteTransaction
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote transaction definition which is RMI compliant but does not actually extend the Transaction interface. Client class is responsible for adapting Transaction calls to RemoteTransaction calls.
    Author:
    Brian S O'Neill
